thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Kirkland Lake Gold Reports Q4 EPS Of $0.20‍​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Kirkland Lake Gold Reports Q4 EPS Of $0.20‍​
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Kirkland Lake Gold Ltd:
* KIRKLAND LAKE GOLD REPORTS STRONG FULL-YEAR AND Q4 2017 EARNINGS AND CASH FLOW
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.20‍​ * ‍ ADJUSTED NET EARNINGS FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS IN Q4 2017 OF $0.34 PER SHARE​
* ‍Q4 2017 REVENUE TOTALED $212.4 MILLION, UP 63% * Q4 2017 PRODUCTION TOTALED 166,579 OUNCES, 56 PERCENT INCREASE FROM Q4 2016
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.23, REVENUE VIEW $211.2 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
